title: Running Out of Time: Saving the World’s Oceans
itunes:title: Running Out of Time: Saving the World’s Oceans
description: World Ocean Observatory founder Peter Neill talks about the dire emergency in which the world’s oceans currently find themselves in and what must be done to save them.
content:encoded: World Ocean Observatory founder Peter Neill talks about the dire emergency in which the world’s oceans currently find themselves in and what must be done to save them.
itunes:subtitle: World Ocean Observatory founder Peter Neill talks about the dire emergency in which the world’s oceans currently find themselves in and what must be done to save them.
itunes:summary: World Ocean Observatory founder Peter Neill talks about the dire emergency in which the world’s oceans currently find themselves in and what must be done to save them.
itunes:author: Institute for New Economic Thinking (INET)
